articles.title: γ-Linolenic acid in maternal milk drives cardiac metabolic maturation - Nature.com
articles.description: The switch from glucose- to fatty acid-dependent metabolism in cardiomyocytes of newborn mice is governed by γ-linolenic acid in maternal milk, which binds to retinoid X receptors, thereby causing a transcription-dependent metabolic transition.

articles.title: France bans short-haul flights in effort to fight climate change - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Air travel between Paris and regional hubs such as Nantes, Lyon and Bordeaux will now be banned.
articles.content:
France has formally banned domestic flights on short routes that can be covered by train in less than two-and-a-half hours in a move aimed at reducing airline emissions.
